document.discussion_title: Chiller, the face of Australia's 'ordinary' Olympics
document.topic_text: RIO DE JANEIRO (Reuters) - In Australian vernacular, the phrase "a bit ordinary" is a damning understatement with a meaning closer to "pretty terrible". »
document.post: RIO DE JANEIRO (Reuters) - In Australian vernacular, the phrase "a bit ordinary" is a damning understatement with a meaning closer to "pretty terrible". »
